ah lil wayne.

it tears me up how much he has fallen, from tha carter 2 to rebirth.

but really even in his prime most could beat weezy: jay z, kanye, nas, biggie, 2pac, mf doom, em, it would be stupid to say he was god send.

also nas on his prime > eminem on his prime just saying, but the guy struggles for good (unlike jay z who has fallen just as hard as wayne)

also wtf do they got spilled on their heads?.

topics.body:
*Gets to where it is*

*We have a staredown*

Where do you guys keep coming from anyway?

_Driver On! Please!_

Guess I'll have to defeat you then.

*Activates the Wizardriver*

_Shabadoobi Touch Henshin! Shabadoobi Touch Henshin!_

*It keeps repeating that in a singing voice*

Henshin!

_Shabadoobi Touch Henshin!_

_Flame! Please!_

_Fire! Fire! Fire! Fire! Fire!_

!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/2/2f/Kamen_Rider_Wizard.jpg!
It's Showtime.
